product_name: Timbuk2 Classic Bike Messenger Bag - Extra Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The extra-small Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag is bread and butter-a no-frills, tough-as-heck messenger that hugs you forever. Originally built for hard-working bike messengers, the Classic Messenger Bag has been in production for 19 years. Known for its durability and distinctive 3-panel, multicolor design, it has been adopted in cities around the world as the everyday, all-purpose carryall. Exterior is built to last with rugged ballistic nylon and heavy-duty stitching; waterproof thermoplastic polyurethane lining. Quick-adjust, side-cam shoulder strap; strap pad included. 2 large internal slot pockets and zippered pocket, including additional pen slots and business card slot. Front pocket with extra zippered side-entry pocket. The Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag includes reflector tails and a safety flasher attachment loop. Closeout.
short_description: The extra-small Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag is bread and butter-a no-frills, tough-as-heck messenger that hugs you forever.
